techmeme.title: A US judge sentences former FTX executive Ryan Salame to 7.5 years after he pled guilty to criminal charges over political contributions and more in 2023 (Sarah Wynn/The Block)
Microsoft confirms Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 will be available day one on Xbox Game Pass and PC Game Pass; Activision typically sells 20M+ copies of a COD game (Tom Warren/The Verge)
A US appeals court sets a fast-track schedule to consider legal challenges to the US law requiring a TikTok ban or sale, with oral arguments in September 2024 (David Shepardson/Reuters)
Private equity firm Bridgepoint buys a majority stake in LumApps, used by ~700 organizations to build and provision comms and workforce apps, in a $650M deal (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Google unveils new AI features for Chromebook Plus devices, including Gemini, and says new Chromebook Plus owners will get a free year of Google One AI Premium (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
